content.rendered:
Halloween is coming up- and most of us love to carve pumpkins around this time of year! But, don’t waste all those seeds inside the pumpkin!! Cooking the seeds is actually my favorite part about carving:)
Learn what I do and why they’re actually really good for you! It’s the perfect snack! Let me know what you think!
